product.name: GE Plug-In Smart Switch
product.description: White remote control lamp module (Works with Iris)
product.keywords: GE, Jasco, indoor, module, control, outlet, plug, switch, energy, 110, volt, 15, amp, power, z-wave, 12719

step1.text: Plug the Indoor module into the outlet where you intend to use it.

step2.text: To pair your Indoor Module, press the button on the front of it. The hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

product.name: GE Plug-In Outdoor Smart Switch
product.description: GE 15-Amp Black Single Electrical Outlet (Works with Iris)
product.keywords: GE, Jasco, outdoor, module, control, outlet, plug, switch, energy, 110, volt, power, waterproof, z-wave, 45635, 12720

step1.text: Plug the Outdoor module into the outlet where you intend to use it.

step2.text: The green Connection Status light will flash twice, then remain solid when ready to connect.

step3.text: Enter the 14 digit code found on the rating decal, located on the rim below the salt lid hinges.

step0.text: TIP: Do not use other Iris devices at this time to avoid removing them.

step1.text: Press the button located on the device.

step2.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product.name: GE In-Wall Smart Outlet
product.description: GE 15-Amp White Duplex Electrical Outlet (Works with Iris)
product.keywords: GE, Jasco, indoor, control, in, wall, outlet, plug, switch, energy, duplex, receptacle, 110, volt, power, z-wave, 45636, 12721

step1.text: Install the Duplex Receptacle as described in the printed instructions included with your device.

step2.text: To pair your Outdoor Module, press the button on the front of it. The Hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

product.name: GE In-Wall Smart Dimmer
product.description: GE 15-Amp 600-Watt White CFL/LED Digital Dimmer (Works with Iris)
product.keywords: GE, Jasco, indoor, control, in, wall, switch, dimmer, energy, 110, volt, 15 amp, power, z-wave, 45639, 45613, 12724

step1.text: Install the switch as described in the printed instructions included with your device.

step2.text: To pair your dimmer switch, press the top of the rocker switch once. The Hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

product.name: First Alert Smoke Detector
product.description: First Alert Battery-Powered 3-Volt Smoke Detector (Works with Iris)
product.keywords: First, Alert, smoke, fire, detector, sensor, safety, alarm, indoor, z-wave, zsmoke

step2.text: Insert batteries checking the correct orientation.
Press and hold the test button. Keep it held down as you slide the battery drawer closed, then release the button. The Iris hub will beep when Detector has paired successfully.

product.name: First Alert Smoke and CO Detector
product.description: First Alert Battery-Powered 3-Volt Smoke Detector (Works with Iris)
product.keywords: First, Alert, smoke, CO, carbon monoxide, fire, detector, sensor, safety, alarm, indoor, z-wave, zsmoke

step2.text: Insert batteries checking the correct orientation.
Press and hold the test button. Keep it held down as you slide the battery drawer closed, then release the button. The Iris hub will beep when Detector has paired successfully.

product.name: Schlage Camelot Lever Lock (Satin Nickel)
product.description: Camelot Satin Nickel Universal Electronic Entry Door Lever.
product.keywords: Schlage, Camelot, door, lock, lever, security, FE599IR, CAM, 619, entry, keypad, z-wave, satin, nickel

step1.text: Make a note of the 6 digit program code from sticker on the inside of the lock or included in your lock installation instructions before you install it. Then follow the printed instructions to install your lock into your door.

step2.text: Ensure your lock has the batteries properly installed. Enter the six digit program code. Wait for the Schlage button to flash and beep three times.

step3.text: Press the Schlage button once. Then press the number 0. The Hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

step1.text: Push the button, see it go away.
Disconnect the battery pack, then press and release the Schlage button

step2.text: Reconnect the battery pack, then press and hold the Schlage button until the backlight turns green and the lock beeps.

step3.text: To reprogram the lock, use the default programming code printed on the label of your user's guide.

step1.text: Install the water softener as described in the manufacturer's instructions.

step2.text: The green Connection Status light will flash twice, then remain solid when ready to connect.

step3.text: Enter the 14 digit code found on the rating decal, located on the rim below the salt lid hinges.

step1.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product.name: Alexa
product.keywords: amazon, echo, tap, dot, alexa, voice, speech

step1.text: Make your home even smarter. Connect Iris and Alexa and start controlling your home with your voice.

product.name: WiFi Smart Switch
product.keywords: Swann, Iris, indoor, module, control, outlet, smart, plug, switch, 120, volt, wifi

step1.text: Insert the switch into a receptacle. Ensure the receptacle is powered. The LED will flash blue during the pairing process.

product.name: 1st Gen Contact Sensor
product.keywords: AlertMe, Iris, contact, temperature, door, window, sensor, zigbee, security, alarm, battery, DWS901

step1.text: Squeeze both sides together on the semi-circles and then pull off the back cover.

step2.text: Insert the battery on top of the battery tab, ensuring correct orientation by matching the black dots.

step3.text: Replace the cover, ensuring the tabs are aligned. The light on the sensor will flash, and the hub will beep when pairing is complete.

step1.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.
